The goal of this file is to just log small changes (usually one) from one PADCONF.BIN file to the next, to help determine what the various bits of the file are doing.

COMMANDS:

PADCONF001.BIN - Initial submit (Pad1, Pad2, Pad3 - max sized file)
    Pad3 - all defaults, start - 0000000, loop - ---, end 46126464

PADCONF002.BIN - Change Start on Pad3
    Pad3 - start - 46126464

000001FD 00 0A
000001FE 00 FF
000001FF 02 48
00000200 00 60
00000226 E9 FF
00000227 2D 48
00000228 F8 60

PADCONF003.BIN - Change Start/End on Pad3
    Pad3 - start - 00000000, end - 00001000

002 - 003 diff

000001FD 0A 00
000001FE FF 00
000001FF 48 02
00000200 60 00
00000201 0A 00
00000202 FF 00
00000203 58 11
00000204 00 A0
00000225 0A 00
00000226 FF 00
00000227 48 11
00000228 60 A0


PADCONF004.BIN - Swap Pad01 with Pad03

000000A1 00 0A
000000A2 01 FF
000000A3 86 58
000000A7 08 02
000000AA 01 00
000000AB 86 11
000000AC 00 A0
000000CF 08 11
000000D0 00 A0
000001F9 0A 00
000001FA FF 01
000001FB 58 86
000001FF 02 08
00000202 00 01
00000203 11 86
00000204 A0 00
00000227 11 08
00000228 A0 00

PADCONF005.BIN - Crop Pad3 from 00024500 to 00024116 (selected 00024832, but?  start was 384'ish?)

000001FB 86 7A
000001FC 00 D0
000001FF 08 02
00000203 86 7A
00000204 00 D0
00000227 08 02
00007C21 FF 00
00007C22 FF 00
00007C23 FF 00
00007C24 FF 00

PADCONF006.BIN - Swap Pad01 and Pad03

000000A1 0A 00
000000A2 FF 01
000000A3 58 7A
000000A4 00 D0
000000AA 00 01
000000AB 11 7A
000000AC A0 D0
000000CF 11 02
000000D0 A0 00
000001F9 00 0A
000001FA 01 FF
000001FB 7A 58
000001FC D0 00
00000202 01 00
00000203 7A 11
00000204 D0 A0
00000227 02 11
00000228 00 A0
00007B21 FF 00
00007B22 FF 00
00007B23 FF 00
00007B24 FF 00
00007C21 00 FF
00007C22 00 FF
00007C23 00 FF
00007C24 00 FF

PADCONF007.BIN - PadA1 Start from 00000000 to 00000001

000000A8 00 04
000000D0 00 04

PADCONF008.BIN - PadA1 Start from 00000001 to 00000002

000000A8 04 08
000000D0 04 08

PADCONF009.BIN - PadA1 Start from 00000002 to 00001000 (1000 in hex is x03E8, but 4000 would be x0FA0)

000000A7 02 11
000000A8 08 A0
000000CF 02 11
000000D0 08 A0

PADCONF010.BIN - PadA1 Start from 00001000 to 00000500 (500 in hex is x01F4, but 2000 would be x07D0)

000000A7 11 09
000000A8 A0 D0

PADCONF011.BIN - PadA1 Start from 00000500 to 00000255 (255 in hex is 0x00FF, but 1020 would be x03FC)


000000A7 09 05
000000A8 D0 FC

PADCONF012.BIN - PadA1 Start from 00000255 to 00000063 (63 in hex is 0x0099, but 252 would be x00FC)

000000A7 05 02

PADCONF013.BIN - PadA1 start from 00000063 to 00000128 (128x4 is 512, let's see what happens)

000000A7 02 0A
000000A8 FC 00

PADCONF014.BIN - PadA1 start from 00000128 to 00002048 (512x4 is 2048, let's see)

000000A7 0A 22
000000CF 11 22
000000D0 A0 00

PADCONF015.BIN - PadA1 start from 00002048 to 00002049

000000A8 00 04
000000D0 00 04

PADCONF016.BIN - PadA1 start to 00008193

000000A7 22 82
000000CF 22 82

PADCONF017.BIN - PadA1 start to 0008704

000000A7 82 8A
000000A8 04 00
000000CF 82 8A
000000D0 04 00

PADCONF018.BIN - PadA1 start to 0010752

000000A7 8A AA
000000CF 8A AA
